channel.title: How do I change prices in my store?
channel.description: How in the world can I change my prices for the items in stores ?!

item.title: How do I change prices in my store?
item.dc:creator: @ljay_wilson ljay wilson
item.description:
@ljay_wilson wrote:

That would be a pain in the butt to do but I could see the reasoning for it
What is it a 100% totally different server.
The way you use ecto tokens makes me think that would be a good idea :[]
GL with it man.

Read full topic

item.title: How do I change prices in my store?

item.description:
@_Urban wrote:

Oh okay, I see. Thanks
Do you know how to make it so that instead of buying it with coins, I could buy it with Eco Tokens?

item.title: How do I change prices in my store?
item.dc:creator: @drakeman drakeman
item.description:
@drakeman wrote:

ok in item.cfg search ur item, ill do d claw

item = 8002 Dragon_claw A_Powerful_Claw. 350000000 350000000 350000000 41 67 0 0 00 13 26 7 0 0 80 0

the first 3 numbers are the prices,

#1 is buy price
#2 is sell price
#3 is alch price

the rest are bonusâ€™s
